text: Colobothea brullei is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Gahan in 1889. It is known from Bolivia, Paraguay, Ecuador, Peru and Brazil.BioLib.cz - Colobothea brullei. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1889
title: Colobothea brullei
